item.title: My Second Bicycle
item.description: I used to love bicycles until I started working and moved on to ride motorbikes. Motorbikes were convenient, affordable, and fast. I had bought myself a TVS Suzuki Fiero DS (India’s first 150cc bike I think) and I was using it for everyday commute. I had sold my first bicycle and didn’t have one to ride. As it happens as one grows up, I had given up on bicycles. After moving to US, I live very close walk to work and don’t need any vehicles for travel.
